description.italian: Hai chiamato con successo 25 animali in Giocatore singolo o Caccia libera
description.koreana: 싱글 플레이 또는 자유 사냥에서 피리로 동물 부르기를 25번 달성했습니다.
description.spanish: Has logrado atraer a 25 animales en el modo para un jugador o Caza libre.
description.schinese: 已在单人游戏或自由狩猎中成功引诱 25 只动物
description.tchinese: 已在單人遊戲或自由狩獵中成功引誘 25 只動物
description.russian: Вы приманили 25 животных в одиночном или свободном режиме.
description.japanese: シングルプレイヤーかフリーハントで25匹の動物を呼ぶことに成功した
description.polish: Z powodzeniem zwabiono 25 zwierząt w trybie dla jednego gracza lub wolnego polowania
description.brazilian: Chamou 25 animais no modo de jogo Individual ou Caçada Livre
description.portuguese: Chamou 25 animais no modo de jogo Individual ou Caçada Livre

displayName.english: To be the best, you've got to beat the best
displayName.italian: Diventare il migliore? Batti i migliori!
displayName.spanish: Para ser el mejor, vence a los mejores
displayName.schinese: 要成为最好的猎手，你就要战胜最好的猎物。
displayName.tchinese: 要成為最好的獵人，你就要戰勝最好的獵物。
displayName.russian: Чтобы стать лучшим, нужно одолеть лучших.
displayName.japanese: オーバー・ザ・トップ

description.english: Completed all legendary animal missions
description.german: Alle Legendäre-Tiere-Missionen abgeschlossen
description.french: Vous avez fini toutes les missions d'animaux légendaires.
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le missioni degli animali leggendari
description.spanish: Has completado todas las misiones de animales legendarios.
description.schinese: 已完成所有传奇动物的任务
description.tchinese: 已完成所有傳奇動物的任務
description.russian: Вы поохотились на всех легендарных животных.
description.japanese: 伝説の動物ミッションをすべて完了した
description.polish: Ukończono wszystkie misje z legendarnymi zwierzętami
description.brazilian: Completou todas as missões de animais lendários
description.portuguese: Completou todas as missões de animais lendários

description.english: Complete a hunt without analyzing a track
description.german: Eine Jagd abgeschlossen, ohne eine Spur zu analysieren
description.french: Vous avez terminé une chasse sans étudier de traces.
description.italian: Hai completato una caccia senza ispezionare tracce
description.spanish: Has completado una cacería sin analizar una huella.
description.schinese: 已在不分析足迹的情况已完成一次捕猎
description.tchinese: 已在不分析足跡的情況已完成一次捕獵
description.russian: Вы поохотились, ни разу не сверившись со звериной тропой.
description.japanese: 跡を調べることなく狩りを完了した
description.polish: Ukończono polowanie bez analizowania tropów
description.brazilian: Completou uma caçada sem analisar um rastro
description.portuguese: Completou uma caçada sem analisar um rastro

displayName.german: Gleich und gleich gesellt sich gern

description.english: Kill 2 animals from the same herd
description.german: Zwei Tiere aus derselben Herde erlegt
description.french: Vous avez tué 2 animaux du même troupeau.
description.italian: Hai ucciso due animali dello stesso branco
description.koreana: 한 무리 안에 있는 2마리의 동물을 죽였습니다.
description.spanish: Has matado 2 animales del mismo rebaño.
description.schinese: 已从同一群动物中猎杀 2 只
description.tchinese: 已從同一群動物中獵殺 2 只
description.russian: Вы убили двух животных из одной группы.
description.japanese: 同じ群れにいる動物を2匹仕留めた
description.polish: Ubito 2 zwierzęta z jednego stada
description.brazilian: Matou 2 animais do mesmo bando
description.portuguese: Matou 2 animais do mesmo bando

description.english: Kill 2 birds with 1 shot
description.german: Zwei Vögel mit einer Kugel erlegt
description.french: Vous avez tué 2 oiseaux avec une balle.
description.italian: Hai ucciso due uccelli con un proiettile
description.koreana: 총알 한 발로 두 마리의 새를 죽였습니다.
description.spanish: Has matado 2 pájaros de un tiro.
description.schinese: 已用 1 发子弹射中 2 只鸟
description.tchinese: 已用 1 發子彈射中 2 只鳥
description.russian: Вы убили двух птиц одним выстрелом.
description.japanese: 1発の銃弾で鳥を2匹仕留めた
description.polish: Ubito 2 ptaki jedną kulą
description.brazilian: Matou 2 aves com 1 bala
description.portuguese: Matou 2 aves com 1 bala

description.english: Kill an entire flock of birds in Waterfowl Hunting
description.german: Einen ganzen Schwarm Vögel bei der Wasservogeljagd erlegt
description.french: Vous avez tué une volée d'oiseaux en Chasse au gibier d'eau.
description.italian: Hai ucciso un intero stormo di uccelli in Caccia all'anatra
description.spanish: Has matado una bandada entera en Caza de aves acuáticas.
description.schinese: 已在水禽狩猎中猎杀整个鸟群
description.tchinese: 已在水禽狩獵中獵殺整個鳥群
description.russian: Вы убили целую стаю в охоте на водоплавающих птиц.
description.japanese: 水鳥ハンティングモードで、鳥の群れをすべて仕留めた
description.polish: Ubito całe stado ptaków podczas polowania na ptactwo wodne
description.brazilian: Abateu todo um bando em Caçando Aves Aquáticas
description.portuguese: Abateu todo um bando em Caçando Aves Aquáticas
